sentences.sContent: Soon after, he dragged me to the Lower East Side where we met an old rabbi, who looked at us a bit askance and said wisely, "You will have a sweet and crazy life together, " which we did.
sentences.sContent_eng: Soon after, he dragged me to the Lower East Side where we met an old rabbi, who looked at us a bit askance and said wisely, "You will have a sweet and crazy life together, " which we did.
sentences.sCn: 很快，他拖着我到了东城，我们遇到一个拉比。 他用有点斜视的目光看着我们，充满睿智的说：“你们将拥有幸福而疯狂的生活。”

remMethod.val: ask + ance(看作ounce, 盎司， 黄金的计量单位) → 问黄金价格 → 斜着眼问 → 斜视地
